version_description:
We've created a multiplayer music trivia game! Play with all of your friends, discover new music and build your playlists while playing, and share results to your social media accounts.
We've also improved skip performance, and fixed a few bugs. Check it out!
We've made making playlists with friends even easier!  We also fixed some pesky bugs.
So excited to give you a totally new way to Discover music. Not only can you “preview” songs, you can also preview playlists, albums and artists…even other users! Check it out!
Fixed a few bugs and improved chat performance.
We've improved the user experience around previewing songs, albums, artists and playlists, and made it more clear how to listen to full songs.
Express your creative inspiration with playlist captions!
Fixes a bug adding cover art to a playlist.
We've made it even easier to start listening to your favorite music!
We've made it even easier to start listening to your favorite music!
We've made it even easier to start listening to your favorite music!
One-click listening to any song, album, artist or your favorite playlister's liked songs!
One-click listening to any song, album, artist or your favorite playlister's liked songs!
Thanks for using Playlist!  We've fixed a few bugs in this release, including a fix for importing playlists.
Thanks for using Playlist!  We've expanded artist pages to include live events and more ways to interact with artists on the platform.

Thanks for using Playlist!  We have created a new community home feed and top users section to bring you closer to your music community.  We've made it even easier to create playlists with friends, simplified other areas of the app and fixed a bunch of bugs.  We hope you enjoy this release!
Thanks for listening on Playlist!  We fixed some bugs, made performance improvements, and other general enhancements.
Thanks for listening on Playlist!  We have added some new features for the community home feed.  Enjoy!
Thanks for listening to Playlist! We've squashed a few bugs and made some other fun changes.
Bug fixes
Thanks for listening to Playlist!  We fixed a few bugs.
Thanks for listening to Playlist!  We've fixed a few bugs.
Thanks for listening to Playlist!  We've fixed a few bugs.
Thanks for listening to Playlist!  We've fixed a few bugs.
Thanks for sharing music on Playlist!  We've added user anthems, a recently-listened-to tab and other improvements to make your profile really stand out!
Thanks for sharing music on Playlist! We've added user anthems, a recently-listened-to tab and other improvements to make your profile really stand out!
Thanks for listening to Playlist!  We've got a newly-redesigned playlist card that showcases the playlist creator, and supports animated GIFs as cover art - Enjoy!
Thanks for listening to Playlist! We've got a newly-redesigned playlist card that showcases the playlist creator, and supports animated GIFs as cover art - Enjoy!
Thanks for listening to Playlist. We've fixed a few bugs for iOS 13.
Thanks for listening with the Playlist community!  We've added a "solo" listening option for when you just want to chill out by yourself.
Thanks for listening with the Playlist community!  We've added new Instagram sharing and smoothed out the UI to make your listening experience even better.
Thanks for listening with Playlist!  Did you know that you can listen and chat privately with your friends?  Check it out!
Thanks for listening with Playlist!  Did you know that you can listen and chat privately with your friends?  Check it out!
Thanks for listening with Playlist!  Did you know that you can listen and chat privately with your friends?  Check it out!
Thanks for listening with Playlist!  Did you know that you can listen and chat privately with your friends?  Check it out!
Thanks for listening to Playlist! Listen with friends in private social spaces.
Thanks for listening on Playlist!  We've fixed some bugs and made the improvements you have asked for!
Thanks for listening on Playlist!  We've made some improvements in skip performance based on user feedback.  Keep those suggestions coming Playlisters!
Thanks for listening on Playlist!  We've made updating your anthem super easy, and made some cool changes in how we play songs in group listening mode.  Enjoy!
Thanks for listening to Playlist!  We've added Bitmoji in playlist chat!
Thanks for listening on Playlist!  We have a new way to promote live events, and fixed a few bugs.
Thanks for listening on Playlist!  We have a new way to promote live events, and fixed a few bugs.
Thanks for listening on Playlist! We have a new way to promote live events, and fixed a few bugs.
Thanks for listening on Playlist!  We have made it even easier to create private playlists for you and your friends.  Listen together and chat in complete privacy!
Thanks for listening on Playlist!  We have made it even easier to create private playlists for you and your friends.  Listen together and chat in complete privacy!
Thanks for listening on Playlist!  We've implemented chat history so you can see messages your friends leave you in your playlists.  Also fixed a few bugs - enjoy!
Thanks for listening on Playlist!  Squashed some bugs and made some improvements based on user feedback.  Enjoy!
Thanks for listening to Playlist!  We've fixed a few bugs in this release.  Enjoy!
Thanks for listening to Playlist!  We made a performance fix that will decrease your power usage and improve your playback experience when listening in spotty networks.  Enjoy!
Thanks for listening to Playlist! We made a performance fix that will decrease your power usage and improve your playback experience when listening in spotty networks. Enjoy!
Thanks for listening to Playlist! We made a performance fix that will decrease your power usage and improve your playback experience when listening in spotty networks. Enjoy!
Added some fun new features, including a shortcut to set your anthem, patreon links so you can tip your favorite artists, and more!
Thanks for listening to Playlist! We have fixed a few bugs in this release.  Enjoy the music!
Thanks for listening to Playlist! We have fixed some bugs with this release. Enjoy the music!
Thanks for listening to Playlist! We have fixed some bugs and made the UI speedier. Enjoy the music!
Thanks for listening on Playlist!  We've fixed a few bugs in this release.  Thanks to all of our listeners - your input is valuable to us.
Thanks for listening with Playlist!  We've fixed a few bugs in this version.

Some bug fixes for the new Playlist Rooms.

A new name, a new vibe. Come hang out and chill with friends and music in new Playlist Rooms!
We've got bug fixes on tap for this release. Thanks for using Riff!

Thanks for Riffing with us.  This release has gifts!  Send your friend, crush, or favorite artist or influencer a gift in their room.  Gifts are converted to Riffle reward points, and can be exchanged for more coins or withdrawn as cash.  Hope you enjoy!
